quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive documentation with only broken links preventing it from being perfect. Content is accurate and well-structured with clear examples.

issues.description: Two internal links reference non-existent subsections
issues.fix_suggestion: Either create the missing subsections (basic-retry-configuration.md and timeout-configuration.md) or remove these links from the See Also section. Alternative: Link to existing related content in the MapReduce index or combine retry configuration into this subsection.

issues.description: Documentation shows 'attempts' field but doesn't clarify relationship with 'max_attempts' terminology used elsewhere
issues.should_be: Consistent terminology throughout - either 'attempts' (as in struct) or 'max_attempts' (as in descriptions)
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that the field name is 'attempts' but it represents 'maximum retry attempts'. Update inline comments to use 'attempts' consistently with struct field name.

Clear code references with line numbers for verification
Detailed examples for each strategy with behavior explanations
Helpful best practices table matching scenarios to strategies
Good troubleshooting section with common issues
MapReduce integration examples are clear and complete
Timeout interaction warning is valuable practical advice
